net.consensys.cava.io.file

Class Files

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.consensys.cava.io.file.Files

  • public final class Files
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for working with files.

      • createFileIfMissing

        public static boolean createFileIfMissing(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                          java.nio.file.attribute.FileAttribute<?>... attrs)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Create a file, if it does not already exist.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the file to create.
        attrs - An optional list of file attributes to set atomically when creating the file.
        Returns:
        true if the file was created.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs or the parent directory does not exist.

      • atomicReplace

        public static void atomicReplace(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                 IOConsumer<java.io.Writer> fn)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Write a temporary file and then replace target.
        Parameters:
        path - The target file to be replaced (if it exists).
        fn - A consumer that will be provided a buffered Writer instance that will write to the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.

                          throws java.io.IOException
        Write a temporary file and then replace target.
        Parameters:
        path - The target file to be replaced (if it exists).
        charset - The charset of the file.
        fn - A consumer that will be provided a buffered Writer instance that will write to the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
